availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas Chalmers Calvert (Warren County, KY banker)

body.p: Residence: Bowling Green, Warren County, Kentucky. A Tennessee-born banker. Cashier of the Bowling Green branch of the Northern Bank of Kentucky. Son of Samuel Wilson Calvert and Elizabeth Caroline Hall. Married Margaret Younglove. Father of Eliza Carolina (Calvert) Obenchain.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District 1, Bowling Green post office, p. 143.

Find A Grave, Entry for Thomas Chalmers Calvert (1826-1898), Find A Grave Memorial # 31215333, Fairview Cemetery, Bowling Green, Warren County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=calvert&GSfn=thomas&GSby=1826&GSbyrel=in&GSdyrel=all&GSob=n&GRid=31215333&df=all& (accessed 12 Aug 2017).
